title: New: MYPET – Pays To Know
body:
Having recently announce the release of their debut single through uber-cool label Luv Luv Luv, LA duo **MYPET** have dropped a stream of the aforementioned track.

_Pays To Know_ is a funky jam, centred around the seductive vocals and sensual bass line, a sure fire indie blog hit. It may well be their first outing, but it’s already clear to see exactly what LLL have seen in **MYPET**.
